title: My Thoughts Are Murder to the State
description: Thoreau's essays on political philosophyâ€”a more complete collection than most. Includes Civil Disobedience, Slavery in Massachusetts, A Plea for Captain John Brown, The Last Days of John Brown, Remarks After the Hanging of John Brown, Herald of Freedom, Sir Walter Raleigh, Reform and the Reformers, Paradise (to be) Regained, Wendell Phillips Before the Concord Lyceum, The Service, and Life Without Principle
author: Henry David Thoreau
